select u.id as u_id, u.username as u_username, u.name as u_name, u.birthday as u_birthday, u.mobile as u_mobile, u.remark as u_remark, r.id as r_id, r.name as r_name, r.value as r_value from tbl_user u inner join tbl_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join tbl_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where u.disabled = 0
and (u.id = #{key} or u.username like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or u.name like concat('%', #{key},'%') or u.mobile like concat('%', #{key},'%') )
order by u_id asc
select distinct r.value from tbl_user u inner join tbl_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join tbl_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.username = #{username}

select distinct p.value from tbl_user u inner join tbl_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join tbl_role_permission rp on ur.role_id = rp.role_id inner join tbl_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where u.username = #{username}
